Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/Congress
ShortDescription: Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Congress, Racine, Madison and Ashland due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Congress, Racine, Madison, then resume their normal route on Ashland.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.
